title: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first pagei. the first and second column could be mergedj.
OB: a. buttons are too smallb. when coming up, no table entry is selected. however, both move buttons areenablede. when changing a param name tosomething very long, the preview is cur off.g. dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters

It would be nice if the signature preview has the backaground color set tothe same color as a hoverh.
